testCase.name: HourUnitDataRepository getHourlyEmissions calls createQueryBuilder and gets all HourUnitData from the repository
HourlyApportionedEmissionsService getHourlyEmissions calls HourUnitDataRepository.getHourlyEmissions() and gets all emissions from the repository
HourlyApportionedEmissionsService getHourlyEmissions calls HourUnitDataRepository.getHourlyEmissions() with pagination parameters and gets all emissions from the repository
HourlyApportionedEmissionsService getHourlyEmissions calls HourUnitDataRepository.getHourlyEmissions() with filters for unitFuelType and controlTechnologies
HourlyApportionedEmissionsService getHourlyEmissions calls HourUnitDataRepository.getHourlyEmissions() with filters for unitFuelType but not for controlTechnologies
HourlyApportionedEmissionsService getHourlyEmissions calls HourUnitDataRepository.getHourlyEmissions() with filters for controlTechnologies but not for unitFuelType

-- Hourly Apportioned Emissions Params DTO -- * getHourlyEmissions should fail all of the validation pipes
